Reviews.Title: Great choice for the price
Reviews.Author: Rena DeFoore
Reviews.Content: With this bundle I received...Camera18-55mm lens75-300mm lens2 uv filters/lens coverscase2 batteries1 chargerusb cableextended flashmemory card and walletcard readerlcd screen protectorslens cleaning kitI wanted to list it out b/c sometimes they seemed confusing compared to the pictures.I have had this camera for a month now. And have been working with it frequently at home. I was looking for a quality camera but not a huge price. I found it! I love this camera! I saw the other cameras with more pixels but felt it wasn't worth the price difference. I was looking for at least 2 lenses to work with and any extras I could get my hands on. If you are just starting out with cameras, this is a great purchase. I already had a tripod, which some of the other bundles came with. I felt the extended flash would be  more beneficial for me personally. The filters are merely a way to protect your lenses... good idea... and you get the extra battery and a charger. Which is great when you use it all day. The case is ok. It does not zip. Four buckles to close it. But it does hold EVERYTHING.I will say, the camera can do so much for you on the auto settings. If you never learn to use it otherwise it takes great quality pictures. However, I am teaching myself to use it on manual, but until then I can still take great pictures. I would definitely recommend this item.I also had some questions about the camera and the seller was very prompt to answer all of my question with email and phone calls. That too was nice. Excellent customer service from Cameta Camera!

Reviews.Title: love it!!!!!
Reviews.Author: jess c
Reviews.Content: love this camera! its easy to use and and takes great pictures!!! will reccomend this camera to family and friends!!!

Reviews.Title: great camera at an unbeatable price
Reviews.Author: Richard Rogers
Reviews.Content: upgraded from my old fuji digital camera to this - consumer reports loves and recommended it and so do it.  haven't found a better price for the combo than I got here on amazon.

Reviews.Title: Awesome product, great price
Reviews.Author: kelleylou72
Reviews.Content: This is my first DSLR camera so I wasn't looking to invest a great deal of money.  This bundle provided me with so many additional accessories, which is adding to my picture taking "fun."  Plus the picture quality is excellent in comparison to my old camera's pictures....and yet I haven't even really learned how to use all the features of this new one and I'm already very, very happy with it.  I highly recommend this camera bundle!  Lastly, I received the shipment well in advance of the anticipated delivery date and it was securely packaged.  Could not be happier with this shopping experience :)

Reviews.Title: Amazon Canon Bundle
Reviews.Author: DukeBud
Reviews.Content: I am new to SLR's but what I have taken so far on the creative side has been AWESOME.Canon EOS Rebel T3 12.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II Zoom Lens + 16GB Deluxe Accessory Kit

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3 12.2 MP Digital SLR Camera Body & EF-S 18-55mm IS II...
Reviews.Author: Xavier Alvarado
Reviews.Content: I like this camera. I recommended it to my family and friends.I have take a few pictures to proof it and they are wanderfull

Reviews.Title: Great Beginner/ Amateur camera
Reviews.Author: R. Clarke
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use. controls are quite comprehensive. everytime I use the camera, i discover something new. good fun. I am not disappointed at all. Funny I have not used the eos programs on cd that comes with the package. dont know if that is not allowing me to have an even better experience. However - if you breaking into photography, this is the gear for you. Oh yeah - the Movie Mode is kick ass
